item.title: [PI]Woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

I want to add another tree so when my players reach 99, they can cut this tree to get just money. I wanted to use an evergreen tree to use as the 99 tree:

case 1316: //evergreen c.woodcut[0] = 995; c.woodcut[1] = 99; c.woodcut[2] = 300; c.getWoodcutting().startWoodcutting(c.woodcut[0], c.woodcut[1], c.woodcut[2]); break;
Currently it only gives 1 coin, but how can I make it give 100k coins instead of 1?

Read full topic
